response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We're offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless transaction and top-notch customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
